wordGroup: supplier quality engineer 供应商质量工程师

sentences.en: The equipment can be purchased from your local supplier.
sentences.cn: 这种设备可从您当地的供应商购买。

sentences.en: A supplier wants to get in on the ground floor and grow with the business.
sentences.cn: 一个供应商想一开始就加入并随着生意的扩大而发展。

sentences.en: They struck a deal with their paper supplier, getting two years of newsprint on credit.
sentences.cn: 他们与其纸张供应商达成一个协议，可以赊购两年的新闻纸。
